models.engineer: The engineer whose scorecard is being viewed — includes name, level, project assignment, and current period.
models.pulseScore: The composite score and all 4 pillar breakdowns for the current period, with sparkline trend data over the last 6 periods.
models.deliverySubMetrics: The 3 automated delivery metrics (PR Cycle Time, Deploy Frequency, Investment Mix) pulled from GitHub and Jira.
models.clientSatisfaction: NPS and CSAT scores from the latest bi-weekly client pulse survey.
models.teamFeedback: Lead check-in entries with status tags, scores, and notes.
models.growth: Engineer self-assessment data including skills, level, and growth trajectory.
models.periodComparison: Side-by-side comparison of current vs. previous period scores with delta percentages.
models.timeline: Chronological feed of all signals — surveys, check-ins, self-assessments, alerts, and action items.

relationships: Engineer has one PulseScore per period combining all 4 pillar scores
PulseScore contains DeliverySubMetrics, ClientSatisfaction, TeamFeedback, and Growth data
Each pillar score has a sparkline showing 6 periods of historical data
PeriodComparison references two adjacent PulseScores for delta calculation
Timeline events reference signals from all pillars chronologically

clientSatisfaction.latestFeedback: Sofia has been great at communicating blockers early. Turnaround on the dashboard redesign was solid.

teamFeedback.notes: Consistent delivery this period. Sofia took ownership of the migration sprint and kept the team aligned. Could push more on code review turnaround.
Noticed Sofia mentoring two junior devs on the API integration. Good leadership signal.

growth.justification: Led the event bus redesign and documented the architecture decision. Mentoring two junior engineers on API integration patterns.

selfAssessment.justification: Led the event bus redesign and documented the architecture decision. Mentoring two junior engineers on API integration patterns.
selfAssessment.targetPlan: Lead 2 architecture reviews per sprint and document patterns for the team wiki.
